languages.text: "Жизнь при дворе полна своих историй — горьких и не очень. Но все это сущий пустяк по сравнению с тем, что выпадает на вашу долю, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Поверьте, совершенно не стоящий вашего времени пустяк".

traits.locale_text: "Жизнь придворных слуг полна своих историй — горьких и не очень. Но все это сущий пустяк по сравнению с тем, что выпадает на вашу долю, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Поверьте, совершенно не стоящий вашего времени пустяк". {n}Лидзи улыбается — с тихой печалью в глазах.{/n}

languages.text: "Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."
languages.original_text: "Жизнь при дворе полна своих историй — горьких и не очень. Но все это сущий пустяк по сравнению с тем, что выпадает на вашу долю, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Поверьте, совершенно не стоящий вашего времени пустяк".

traits.locale_text: "Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, trust me."

"Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

"Any court servant could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my {mf|lord|lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, trust me." {n}Lidzy smiles, a quiet sadness reflected in her eyes.{/n}

"Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

"Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

"Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, trust me."

"Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

languages.text: “宫廷里的每个人都有很多故事可以讲给您听，有的很可怕，而有的没那么可怕。不过，与您肩负的重担相比，这一切都算不了什么，来自上界的大人。比起听我说这些闲言碎语，您肯定有更值得的事情要做，大人。”
languages.original_text: "Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

traits.locale_text: “宫廷里的每个人都有很多故事可以讲给您听，有的很可怕，而有的没那么可怕。不过，与您肩负的重担相比，这一切都算不了什么，来自上界的大人。比起听我说这些闲言碎语，您肯定有更值得的事情要做，大人。”

languages.text: «Cualquier miembro de la corte podría contarle infinidad de historias, tanto alegres como macabras. Pero todas ellas palidecen en comparación con sus propias vivencias, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. Créame, tiene mejores cosas que hacer que escuchar mis historias».
languages.original_text: "Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquier miembro de la corte podría contarle infinidad de historias, tanto alegres como macabras. Pero todas ellas palidecen en comparación con sus propias vivencias, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial. Créame, tiene mejores cosas que hacer que escuchar mis historias».

languages.text: "Saraydaki herkes size çeşitli iç karartıcı ya da normal hikâyeler anlatabilir. Ancak hiçbiri sizin zahmetlerinizle kıyaslanamaz Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Anlatacaklarımı dinlemekten çok daha iyi işleriniz vardır, inanın bana."
languages.original_text: "Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

traits.locale_text: "Saraydaki herkes size çeşitli iç karartıcı ya da normal hikâyeler anlatabilir. Ancak hiçbiri sizin zahmetlerinizle kıyaslanamaz Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}. Anlatacaklarımı dinlemekten çok daha iyi işleriniz vardır, inanın bana."

languages.text: 「宮廷にいる者なら誰でもたくさんの話を聞かせてくれますわ―気味の悪い話もそうでない話も。でもあなたの苦労に比べたら何でもございませんわ、天の{mf|君|姫}。信じてください、私の話を聞くよりももっとした方がいいことがありますよ」
languages.original_text: "Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

traits.locale_text: 「宮廷にいる者なら誰でもたくさんの話を聞かせてくれますわ―気味の悪い話もそうでない話も。でもあなたの苦労に比べたら何でもございませんわ、天の{mf|君|姫}。信じてください、私の話を聞くよりももっとした方がいいことがありますよ」

languages.text: « À la cour, n'importe qui pourrait vous raconter des tas d'histoires, sinistres ou autres. Mais par rapport à ce que vous avez vécu, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, ces contes seraient bien dérisoires. Vous avez bien mieux à faire que d'écouter mes fables, croyez-moi. »
languages.original_text: "Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

traits.locale_text: « À la cour, n'importe qui pourrait vous raconter des tas d'histoires, sinistres ou autres. Mais par rapport à ce que vous avez vécu, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, ces contes seraient bien dérisoires. Vous avez bien mieux à faire que d'écouter mes fables, croyez-moi. »

languages.text: "Jeder am Hof könnte Euch unzählige Geschichten erzählen ... düstere und weniger düstere. Aber im Vergleich zu Euren Mühen ist das gar nichts, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Glaubt mir, Ihr habt Besseres zu tun, als Euch meine Geschichten anzuhören."
languages.original_text: "Anyone at court could tell you plenty of stories — the grim and the not so grim. But it's nothing compared to your travails, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. You have far better things to do than listen to my tales, believe me."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder am Hof könnte Euch unzählige Geschichten erzählen ... düstere und weniger düstere. Aber im Vergleich zu Euren Mühen ist das gar nichts, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Glaubt mir, Ihr habt Besseres zu tun, als Euch meine Geschichten anzuhören."
